LinnaeusTesting: ^COSMO: Ew, it's really humid here... My visors are fogging right up!
^CIELLE: The rustling of the leaves is really nice though...
^???: So... you have come to ask the Earth a question...
^???: The chime of the bell signifies the presence of one seeking an answer from the great Earth...
^CIELLE: No, sorry... We don’t have a question for the “Earth”, but rather-
^???: I am called Linnaeus, the current Pluvian Elder... I look over these lands and my tribe of the Pluvia...
^COSMO: Perfect! We have heard about you, we were wanting to ask some questions...
^LINNAEUS: What were you wanting to gain insight on, young ones?
PluvianElixirs: ^CIELLE: We saw some Pluvian elixirs out there in the market... how are they made?
^LINNAEUS: Ah, our elixirs? Listen well, young ones...
^LINNAEUS: Across these lands, there are various forms of plant life boasting rich nutrients and unique properties...
^LINNAEUS: Pluvian that are destined to become the Elders of the tribe much like myself have one characteristic that the other members do not...
^LINNAEUS: The sap of a Pluvian Elder contains the genetic makeup for all forms of plant life found in this world.
^LINNAEUS: One droplet is extremely potent with the characteristics of all florae, so it is diluted and curated within various other elements...
^LINNAEUS: The most common ingredient would be the spring waters found within our homeland...
^COSMO: How does it affect the elixirs though?
^LINNAEUS: I have willingly given my tribe one droplet of the sap that courses through me...
^LINNAEUS: That sap is used to create all the elixirs you have come across.
^LINNAEUS: A single droplet can be used to produce thousands upon thousands of elixirs...
^CIELLE: All those elixirs have basically come from you... That’s amazing!
AboutLinnaeus: ^CIELLE: We were curious about what you do here in this temple...
^COSMO: ...Did they just fall asleep on us? Rude...
^LINNAEUS: ...Fear not, for I am merely always in a deep state of meditation...
^LINNAEUS: As the Elder of the Pluvia tribe, I am the one most in tune with the great Earth and can hear all her wishes and requests...
^CIELLE: What sort of requests would those be?
^LINNAEUS: If anyone is to do anything with the lands around here, be it removing a tree or planting new seeds, they must come to me first...
^LINNAEUS: ...Don’t be mistaken, young one. My blessing is not what they seek, but rather the blessing of the Earth itself...
^COSMO: Okay, that time they definitely fell asleep!
^LINNAEUS: ...The Earth has many songs that she sings, I must pay attention.
^CIELLE: With all the noise coming from the market festival, how can you hear anything the Earth is saying?
^LINNAEUS: I do not listen... I feel.
^LINNAEUS: My roots reach far below into the rich soils of the Earth. It is there where I can hear her songs...
YoungOnes: ^CIELLE: Why do you call us 'young ones'? You don’t look that much older than me...
^LINNEAUS: Aha... appearances can be deceiving. I am in fact 300 years old, and am close to the end of my time here.
^COSMO: What? I mean it’s pretty old you gotta admit...
^LINNAEUS: Indeed. Living this long, I’m never surprised at the new wonders I learn about on this planet...
^LINNAEUS: A robot such as yourself is a new sight indeed.
^COSMO: And I’m the best looking one you’ll ever see I’m sure!
^CIELLE: So you’ve been sitting here for 300 years?
^LINNAEUS: A little less. I was appointed as Elder 280 years ago.
^LINNAEUS: We Pluvia have ranging life spans, I am one of the longest sitting Elders for some generations.
^LINNAEUS: We are the people of the Earth, and so we must always be in contact with her.
^COSMO: So... you’re almost at the end of your... sitting?
^LINNAEUS: Yes. Behind me is where the Pluvia people of this land reside, and another will eventually take my place.
FinalKnot: ^LINNAEUS: Anything else you were wanting to know...?
^COSMO: I’ve got one more thing! Why do you just sit right here in the middle of the temple and not anywhere else?
^LINNAEUS: Ah, because it is tradition that we root ourselves in the places that our ancestors gained sentience....
^CIELLE: Gained sentience? You mean you weren’t always-
^COSMO: Give them a sec, they’re meditating.
^CIELLE: I guess it’s a lot of work always listening to the Earth. Maybe there’s more on the Pluvia in the market...
